EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - New Tricentis Professional Program - 2014.11.21.Email - Follow Up - At
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our webinar: New Tricentis Professional Training Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: New Tricentis Professional Training Program – Available Jan 2015
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thanks for taking the time to attend our ‘New and Improved Tricentis Professional Training Program’ webinar, introducing blended learning modules as well as a new sample web shop application. We hope you enjoyed the webinar and are as excited as we are for the launch in January 2015. Your active participation and engaging questions helped to make the webinar lively and interesting.
Learn more about the training program by accessing our datasheet <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/tricentis/images/20141120 TCP_Training_Factsheet_EN.pdf>.
Pre-registration for the new Professional Training Program is currently available. Please contact the training team here <mailto:training@tricentis.com>. Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Xaver Benz Head of Tricentis Training Tricentis
